All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
EcommerceException
Base exception class for e-commerce related exceptions.
IProductDAO
Interface that contains the methods that will be implemented in ProductDAO
Main
Main class that is located in the main class that runs the program, and the same class that displays the main menu
Product
Product Class
ProductAlreadyExistsException
Exception thrown when a product already exists in the system.
ProductDAO
The ProductDAO class is located in the
ProductNoExistIdException
This exception is thrown when there is no product with the specified ID.
ProductNotCreatedException
This exception is thrown when an error occurs while creating a product.
ProductNotDeletedException
This exception is thrown when an error occurs while deleting a product.
ProductNotFoundException
This exception is thrown when a product with a specific ID is not found.
